classic.name: Piazzale Michelangelo
classic.description: 19th-century piazza with a bronze replica of Michelangelo's David & panoramic views over the city.

classic.name: Cathedral of Santa Maria del Fiore
classic.description: Landmark 1200s cathedral known for its red-tiled dome, colored marble facade & elegant Giotto tower.
classic.address: Piazza del Duomo, 50122 Firenze FI, Italy

classic.name: Piazza della Signoria
classic.description: The city's heart, a square dominated by the 14th-century crenellated tower of the Palazzo Vecchio.
classic.address: P.za della Signoria, 50122 Firenze FI, Italy

classic.name: Basilica of Santa Croce in Florence
classic.description: Neo-Gothic Franciscan church known for its Giotto frescoes, plus tombs of Michelangelo & Galileo.
classic.address: Piazza di Santa Croce, 16, 50122 Firenze FI, Italy

classic.name: Brunelleschi's dome

classic.name: Ponte Vecchio
classic.description: Picturesque medieval arched river bridge with Roman origins, lined with jewelry & souvenir shops.

classic.description: 15th-century Dominican church including famous frescoes by Gothic & early Renaissance masters.
classic.address: P.za di Santa Maria Novella, 18, 50123 Firenze FI, Italy

classic.name: Palazzo Vecchio
classic.description: Fortified, 13th-century palace housing lavishly decorated chambers & ornate courtyards.
classic.address: P.za della Signoria, 50122 Firenze FI, Italy

classic.name: Museo Leonardo Da Vinci
classic.description: A collection of interactive machines modeled on the Renaissance artist’s original sketches.
